# birddog <a href="https://roneyfraga.com/birddog/"><img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" alt="birddog logo" style="height: 180px;"></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `birddog` is sniffing out emergence and trajectories in scientific and patent literature.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `birddog` from [GitHub](https://github.com/roneyfraga/birddog/) with:

```{r eval = F}
# install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

# install and load getLattes
devtools::install_github("roneyfraga/birddog")
library(birddog)
```

or the stable version from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=getLattes):

```{r eval = F}
install.packages("birddog")
library(birddog)
```

## Vignettes

The vignettes are available online here:

- <https://roneyfraga.com/birddog/articles/introduction_birddog.html>
